verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Christ, come forth in me
Till my life I no longer can see,
Till the day breaks forth and the darkness is gone.
Christ, come forth in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give me silver till I need no more,
That my redemption may be fully restored.
That the whole world may know that it's no longer I,
But Christ that liveth in me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Give me silver till I need no more,
That my redemption may be fully restored.
That the price may be paid, till I am overlaid
Both inside and outside with gold.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
As I stand in the Name of the Song,
And that work has been completely done,
Lay me down on the cross, counting all else as loss,
Till God comes forth in me.
